contents.item: Getting healthy will always result in weight loss as a side effect, but a side effect of dieting and weight loss is often poorer health.
You see, most people gain weight because they give into cravings. But when you easily (and without feeling like you're depriving yourself) gain control, the extra weight comes off.
Don't look around for the path you are meant to follow, forge it yourself.
Somehow I find the energy to continue the run. Part of the high that comes after finishing a long run is overcoming the wall, that point when your body crashes but your mind keeps moving you forward.
We are the custodians of our bodies. We must take action to employ healthy lifestyle habits to prevent, reduce, and/or manage disease and illness.

People who work out are so gullible. They think they'll live longer. Well, good luck to them. It's a shame most of them aren't bright enough to realise that the extra time added to their life when they're eighty and too old to do anything productive with it is roughly equal to all the time wasted in the gym when they're young and capable of having fun.
We are all bodybuilders, so build the house you want to live in.
Optimal nutrition is eating the right things, in the right amounts, at the right time.
contents.owner: Siim Land, Becoming a Self-Empowered Being: The Journey Towards Achieving Body-Mind-Mastery and Living According to One's Calling.

contents.item: Yoga is a lifestyle and not just a mere kind of exercise to stay fit and health. It is a science which unfolds the endless potentials of our mind and soul.
You must transform your confidence in order to transform your body.
FIT: Overall lean frame gained due to regular planned exercising and balanced diet...having the right metabolism.
Only bacteria thrive and live well in a poorly cared for body.
The medical system serves a very important purpose for many, but our most common lifestyle diseases are better served with use of the Self Care System.

Training is the word we use now. To train means to teach a particular skill over a period of time. Every time you get up, show up, work out, you are training yourself to be better, to live happier and healthier. Don’t expect results in a snap. Remember, change takes however long it takes.
You can’t do it for someone else. No matter how much they motivate or inspire you, you have to do it for yourself. Your health is YOUR responsibility.
When the finish line seems too far away, remember how you felt when you were back at the starting line. Regain that motivation to recharge your momentum.
It’s rare to be depressed and be in prime health. Healthy people tend to be happy people.
As we’re bombarded daily with new ads for pills, diets and ab-doers, we have to protect our wallets and our time.

Charred, blackened, and cooked, the morsel was brought to the mouth and chewed, contemplated, and swallowed with relish. There was no sauce or seasoning and no consideration for aesthetics or art. Yet the combination of meat and fire yielded something revolutionary. Cooked meat made man happy.
contents.owner: Tony Federico, Paleo Grilling: A Modern Caveman's Guide to Cooking with Fire

contents.item: Rage, recover, repeat.
